original: intros g f x H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold ex_lim, ex_Rbar_div in *. destruct H1 as [l1 H1]. destruct H2 as [l2 H2]. intros H5. specialize (H4 H1 H2). destruct H4 as [l H4]. exists l. apply is_lim_div. - apply Lim_correct. apply H1. - apply Lim_correct. apply H2. - unfold not. intro H6. apply H3. rewrite H4. apply Rbar_mult_1_l.
